azurerm_private_dns_ptr_record.description: Manages a Private DNS PTR Record.

name.description: The name of the DNS PTR Record. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zone_name.description: Specifies the Private DNS Zone where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

records.description: List of Fully Qualified Domain Names.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The Private DNS PTR Record ID.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the DNS PTR Record.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS PTR Record.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS PTR Record.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS PTR Record.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS PTR Record.
